content:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/api_server.py
DIR_STATE:["src/__init__.py", "src/api_server.py", "src/artifact_gate.py", "src/build_logging.py", "src/build_paths.py", "src/build_runner.py", "src/build_steps.py", "src/cli.py", "src/codebook.py", "src/config.py", "src/data_models.py", "src/demo_run.py", "src/discovery.py", "src/evaluation.py", "src/id_convention.py", "src/id_mismatch_checker.py", "src/id_schema.py", "src/id_system.py", "src/io_formats.py", "src/io_utils.py", "src/loaders.py", "src/logging_utils.py", "src/main.py", "src/meta_utils.py", "src/models.py", "src/routing_policy.py", "src/run_meta_analysis.py", "src/schema_utils.py", "src/storage.py", "src/threshold_sweep.py", "src/uncertainty_signals.py", "src/validate_annotations.py", "src/validator.py", "src/verify_build_artifacts.py"]
Summary: Implemented a minimal HTTP DOI resolution API with end-to-end redirect resolution, metadata fetching, normalization, provenance fields, and JSONL structured logging to a per-run artifacts directory.
